item.title: Tableau Developer  - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Title:** Tableau Developer

**Location:** Remove

**Job Type:** Contract/Full-Time

**About Us:**
OMNI  HR is a dynamic and innovative company specializing in HR sector . We are committed to leveraging data to drive insights and decisions, and we're looking for a talented Tableau Developer to join our team. If you excel in transforming complex data into actionable visualizations, we'd love to hear from you.

**Job Description:**

**Responsibilities:**
- Develop, design, and maintain interactive dashboards and reports in Tableau.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their requirements and deliver data-driven solutions.
- Optimize Tableau dashboards with a focus on usability and performance.
- Analyze complex data sets from various sources and provide insights.
- Maintain and manage Tableau Server and Tableau Online environments.
- Stay updated with the latest Tableau features and best practices.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Tableau Developer or similar role.
- Strong portfolio of existing Tableau dashboards and visualizations.
- Proficiency in data analysis, data visualization, and storytelling through data.
- Excellent understanding of SQL and relational databases.
- Experience with data warehousing concepts and data modeling.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Effective communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with other data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, QlikView).
- Knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R.
- Experience with statistical analysis and predictive modeling.
- Tableau Certification is a plus.

**What We Offer:**
- Competitive compensation.
- Opportunity for long-term projects based on performance.
- A collaborative and innovative work environment.
- Professional development opportunities.

**How to Apply:**
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a portfolio of existing Tableau dashboards and visualizations. Please highlight projects that demonstrate your ability to handle complex data and create compelling visualizations.


**Contact Information:**
Ganesh Rajagopal
ganesh.rajagopal@omnihr.co




Posted On: July 20, 2024 09:09 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Tableau, Digital Mapping, Business Intelligence, Data Visualization, SQL
Skills: Tableau, Digital Mapping, Business Intelligence, Data Visualization, SQL
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Financial Dashboards - Upwork
item.description:
We're expecting 5 Dashboards to be completed in 7-10 days with each linking to a specific google sheets that has complex formulas.

We are seeking a highly skilled Power BI freelancer who is also proficient in Google Sheets for a project focused on creating advanced financial dashboards. The ideal candidate will need to develop and optimize complex formulas in Google Sheets before integrating them into Power BI as visual representation. One key challenge will be constructing formulas for monthly amortization calculations where the interest rate changes annually. An example of the required dashboard is attached to guide the design and functionality.

Budget: $375

item.title: Senior Full Stack Dot Net Developer ( Angular / .NET ) - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Senior Full Stack .NET Developer

Monday to Friday
Remote via Zoom
3 hours/day
Timings : 7am to 10am IST or 8 pm to 12 am IST
Salary: 30,000 INR per month

Note : One needs to be available in the mentioned timings and willing to work by screen share and remote control via Zoom.


Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced Angular and .NET Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in software development with a focus on web development tools and Microsoft technologies. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, leadership skills, and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Required Skills and Experience:

7-10 years of software development experience.
5+ years of relational database development experience, including strong database design, implementation, and SQL query skills. Microsoft SQL Server is preferred (MS SQL 2019/2016/2012).
5+ years of experience with Microsoft development tools, including TFS, C#.NET, and/or ASP.NET MVC (4 or newer is a plus).
Proficiency in C# (Angular), SSIS, SSRS, and agile development methodologies.
Experience with web development tools including HTML5, Web API, JavaScript, jQuery, LINQ, CSS, Kendo UI/Telerik, MVC.
Experience supporting job processing streams and scheduling environments.
Experience with Python, Power BI, and Microsoft Azure Cloud Technology is a plus.
Familiarity with Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services is desired but not required.
Experience working in an Agile scrum development environment is desired but not required.

Budget: $350

Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Microsoft SQL Server, AngularJS, .NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, C#
Skills: Microsoft SQL Server, AngularJS, .NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, C#
Country: USA

item.title: Design and build Microsoft PowerApp for Accounts Payable automation. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled developer to build an application that will automate the collection of accounts payable invoice data. The application should be built using Microsoft PowerApps, Dataverse, and SharePoint with workflow capabilities. The main goal of this project is to streamline the invoice data collection process and improve efficiency within our client's accounts payable department. The developer will be responsible for designing and implementing the application, ensuring seamless integration with our existing systems.

Relevant skills:
- Microsoft PowerApps
- Dataverse
- SharePoint
- Workflow development

This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an expert-level developer with experience in building similar applications.

You will be working as a subcontractor under our corporate banner.

Project timeline:  The client is currently doing requirements gathering and will provide to us August 1st.  You will have 1 week to provide a solution design proposal with an additional week to refine.  The client will vet the proposal and the application development will start on August 23rd.  You will have one month to build a working system to the desired client specifications.  The app will be provided to the client testers and you must be available for both October and November to assist with app refinement and testing. Go live to deploy the app to production is set for November 15th. Post application deployment support may be required.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$120.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 20:43 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft SharePoint Development, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power BI, App Development, App Design, Accounting Basics
Skills: Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft SharePoint Development, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power BI, App Development, App Design, Accounting Basics
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Data architecture - Upwork
item.description:
Technologies:
• Microsoft Azure (Synapse Analytics)
• Tableau Administration and Content – Security Management
• Proficiency in dbt, Python, Airflow, Spark
• Relational DBMS, API, JSON, and other Data sources
• Data Fabric, Snowflake, Databricks and Asset

    Demonstrated Skills:
• Able to influence, and promote change aligned with best practices
• Technical leadership skills with a strategic and analytical mindset
• Strong conflict resolution skills presenting solutions
• Organized, able to easily establish priorities, and comfortable working within a hybrid team in knowledge and locations.
• Comfortable collaborating with all levels of the business (executives, leadership, others)
• Team players but also able to work autonomously when required
• Self-starter, comfortable taking initiative, motivated, and driven for success
• Experience with AI/ML and predictive analytics
• Experience with data security and compliance
• Experience with data lifecycle management, data-tiering, and data archiving
    
  Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or in a related field
• At least 10 years of experience on complex data projects, technologies for data integration and BI systems to complete collaborative software project.
• Proficiency in ETL tools (add examples.).
• Advanced experience in writing code in Java/Python, either on general programming ability or data processing ability with several data formats (CSV/TSV/JSON/XML).
• Advanced experience in SQL query languages and general setting databases, columnar databases, preferably Azure Synapse.

• Experience in NoSQL query/engine in general setting databases, preferably Redis or MongoDB.
• Expert knowledge of database designs for Data warehouse.
• Sound knowledge of retail and/or manufacturing management systems, CRM, and ERP solutions
• Fluency architecting and documenting architecture at multiple levels (high-level to detailed) and across multiple views (conceptual, logical, physical, data flow and sequence diagrams)
• Experience using Azure DevOps for CI/CD
• Experience in Architecture with cloud platforms like Azure or AWS is a must
• Experience with Analytics tools like Tableau, PowerBI, GoodData

  Responsibilities:
• Responsible for architectural decision-making in data engineering, ensuring scalability and alignment with the company's technical vision and strategy.
• Design and develop data systems to achieve goals, while also documenting for maintainability.
• Review and provide feedback on coworkers' changes, and lead by example by delivering first-class code.
• Investigate complex issues, design better solutions, learn from misprocessing, and implement long-term mitigations.
• Cover requirements by working with data engineer, Business Analysts, and stakeholders.
• Data Architecture Design: Develop and maintain the overall data architecture, ensuring it supports current and future BI and analytics needs, ensuring scalability and alignment with technical vision and strategy.
• Data Modeling: Create and manage logical, physical, and conceptual data models to support business requirements.
• Data Warehousing: Design, implement, and optimize data warehouses and data marts to facilitate efficient data storage and retrieval.
• ETL Processes: Develop and manage robust ETL processes to ensure data is accurately extracted, transformed, and loaded into data warehouses.
• BI Solutions: Design and implement BI solutions using tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or other relevant technologies to provide actionable insights to stakeholders.
• Data Integration: Integrate data from various sources, ensuring data quality and consistency across the organization.
• Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize the performance of BI solutions and data architectures.
• Collaboration: Work closely with business stakeholders, data analysts, and other IT teams to understand business needs and translate them into effective data solutions.
• Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for data architecture, data models, ETL processes, and BI solutions.
• Compliance and Security: Ensure data architectures and BI solutions comply with relevant data privacy and security regulations and best practices.          
• Create frameworks with long-term ROI, establish standards for engineering excellence, identify risks and opportunities, and motivate action.
• Work under Agile methodology always updating last status, creating new tasks, and advising to the team in case of any block.
• Train and mentor less experienced engineers to set directions for other engineers.
• Define testing strategy for data projects to prevent operational incidents.
• Oversee the execution of change management activities and support CI/CD
• Perform other duties as assigned.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 17:23 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:Python, ETL Pipeline, SQL, Big Data, Data Visualization, Amazon Web Services, Apache Kafka, Data Modeling, Data Mining, Visualization
Skills: Python, ETL Pipeline, SQL, Big Data, Data Visualization, Amazon Web Services, Apache Kafka, Data Modeling, Data Mining, Visualization
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Top Notch Graphics & Data Visualization Expert - Upwork
item.description:
A talented Graphics Designer and Data Visualization Expert is required to create compelling and informative visuals for a series of high-impact research journal article. This role involves translating complex data and concepts into visually engaging graphics that enhance understanding and communication. The ideal candidate will possess a strong design portfolio, expertise in data visualization, and an ability to work collaboratively to deliver high-quality visuals aligned with academic standards.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Graphics Design:
o Design and develop infographics, maps, historical timelines, and policy impact flowcharts to effectively communicate key findings from research.
o Create visually appealing comparison charts, case study snapshots, and stakeholder engagement diagrams that illustrate governance models and their impacts.
o Ensure all visuals adhere to the journal's style guide and maintain consistency in design elements such as color schemes, typography, and layouts.
2. Data Visualization:
o Develop sophisticated data visualizations, including heatmaps and alignment matrices, to represent complex datasets and highlight significant patterns and trends.
o Translate quantitative and qualitative research data into clear, interactive, and informative visual formats.
o Collaborate with researchers to understand data intricacies and extract key insights for accurate and impactful visual representation.
3. Quality Assurance:
o Perform quality checks to ensure accuracy and consistency in all graphics and visualizations.
o Ensure all visuals meet accessibility standards and are optimized for various publication formats and platforms.
o Address any revisions or updates based on feedback
Requirements:
1. Experience:
o Proven experience in graphic design and data visualization, with a strong portfolio showcasing relevant work.
o Experience working on academic or research projects is highly desirable.
o Demonstrated ability to create complex visuals from diverse datasets and research findings.
2. Skills:
o Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, and InDesign.
o Expertise in data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js.
o Strong understanding of visual storytelling techniques and best practices in data representation.
o Excellent attention to detail, creativity, and ability to simplify complex information.
3. Personal Attributes:
o Strong communication skills, with the ability to convey design concepts and data insights clearly.
o Ability to work independently, managing multiple tasks and deadlines effectively.
o High level of professionalism and commitment to delivering high-quality work.
o Ability to translate text and data into compelling visuals
Deliverables and Format:
• 8 – 10 visuals per article
• All visuals should be provided in high-resolution formats suitable for publication (e.g., PDF, PNG, SVG).
• Editable versions of all visuals (original formats)

Budget: $40
Posted On: July 19, 2024 19:40 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Data Visualization, Graphic Design, Infographic, Data Analysis
Skills: Data Visualization, Graphic Design, Infographic, Data Analysis
Country: SAU
click to apply

item.title: Python Developer with Data Visualization Skills - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Python Developer with Data Visualization Skills

Overview:
We are seeking a skilled Python Developer with experience in data visualization to join our team for a 1-month project. The project focuses on data collection, preprocessing, integration, and creating visualizations using Tableau or Power BI. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python programming, data handling, and visualization tools.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Data Collection:
• Develop and maintain web scraping scripts using Python libraries (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy) to gather data from various sources.
• Utilize APIs to extract data from public datasets and other online resources.
• Ensure efficient and accurate data extraction and storage.
2. Data Preprocessing:
• Clean and preprocess collected data to ensure consistency, accuracy, and completeness.
• Implement data transformation and normalization processes to prepare data for analysis and visualization.
• Remove duplicates and standardize data formats (e.g., dates, numbers).
3. Data Integration:
• Integrate preprocessed data with NLP models for text classification and question answering.
• Export NLP model outputs in formats compatible with Tableau or Power BI (e.g., CSV, JSON).
• Assist in setting up data pipelines and ETL processes to ensure smooth data flow from collection to visualization.
4. Data Visualization:
• Create interactive and insightful visualizations using Tableau or Power BI.
• Develop dashboards that effectively communicate key metrics and insights.
• Implement interactive elements (e.g., filters, drill-downs) to enhance user experience.
• Ensure data is accurately represented and visualizations are user-friendly.
5. Collaboration and Documentation:
• Work closely with the project manager, data analysts, and other team members to understand data requirements and project goals.
• Document data collection methods, preprocessing steps, and any scripts or tools developed.
• Document the design and development of Tableau or Power BI dashboards.
• Provide regular updates on progress and address any technical challenges.

Qualifications:

• Proficiency in Python: Strong skills in Python programming, with experience in data collection, preprocessing, and integration.
• Web Scraping: Experience with web scraping libraries such as BeautifulSoup and Scrapy.
• Data Handling: Familiarity with data manipulation libraries such as Pandas and NumPy.
• API Integration: Experience with accessing and integrating data from APIs.
• ETL Processes: Knowledge of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and tools.
• Data Visualization: Experience creating visualizations and dashboards using Tableau or Power BI.
• Problem-Solving Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
• Communication: Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
• Documentation: Attention to detail and the ability to document processes and methodologies clearly.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with NLP libraries and models (e.g., transformers, spaCy) is a plus.
• Previous experience in data visualization and dashboard creation.

Duration: 1 month

Location: Remote

Application Process:
Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and why you are interested in this role.

item.title: PowerBI Report based on Project for the Web - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an intermediate to experienced PowerBI professional to build out a report that will grant visibility to our employees into key Project management and operational information. You should have experience in both Power BI and Microsoft Project for the Web, and have demonstrated the ability to use both these products in conjunction. We are currently using a report template (link below), some of which we want to maintain, some of which we want to modify or delete entirely.

https://github.com/OfficeDev/Project-Power-BI-Templates

Key functionalities of the report:
- Allows team members to navigate through MS project schedules without requiring licenses to either PBI or PftW
- Team leads can view resource reports based on Project, showing the planned work vs. capacity (week over week) at the team level, with drilldown to the individual level
- Shows project Milestone status, with both baseline and projected dates, and variance
-Engagement should include a handover call to communicate how to maintain and update the report, with basic troubleshooting advice.

This is a great opportunity to showcase your skills and contribute to the success of our organization.

item.title: Automate Data Integration from API to Google BigQuery - Upwork
item.description:
Project Description:
We are seeking an experienced freelancer to help us automate the process of importing data from a specific API into Google BigQuery.
Should be relatively simple and quick. You should ideally have experience with google cloud platform.
The entire process should be automated to ensure real-time or scheduled updates.

Key Responsibilities:
API Integration:
Connect to the specified API.
Extract relevant data from the API.
Handle authentication and any necessary data transformation.
Google BigQuery:
Set up a new or use an existing BigQuery dataset.
Load the data from the API into BigQuery tables.
Ensure the data is stored efficiently and is optimized for querying.
Automation:
Implement a solution to automate the data extraction and loading process (e.g., using Cloud Functions, Dataflow, or other scheduling services).
Ensure the process can handle incremental updates and is robust to failures.


Documentation & Support:
Provide clear documentation of the process and any configurations made.
Offer support for initial setup and troubleshooting.
Requirements:
Proven experience with API integration and data extraction.
Proficiency in Google BigQuery, including data loading and query optimization.
Experience with automation tools (e.g., Google Cloud Functions, Dataflow, or similar).

Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Good communication skills to ensure clear understanding and reporting.

Preferred Qualifications:
Previous experience with similar projects.
Familiarity with the specific API we are using (details will be provided upon hire).
Experience with cloud-based data warehousing solutions.
Knowledge of best practices in data security and privacy.

Deliverables:
Automated pipeline for data extraction from the API to Google BigQuery.
Detailed documentation of the setup and any configurations.
Initial support and troubleshooting post-deployment.

How to Apply:
If you are interested in this project, please submit your proposal with:

A brief description of your experience and qualifications.
Examples of similar projects you have completed.
Your proposed approach to this project.
A detailed budget and timeline.
We look forward to working with a talented professional who can help us achieve our data integration and visualization goals.

item.title: Data scraping + visualization for prototype product - Upwork
item.description:
This project is to build a prototype for a data visualization product based on data from public sources across different websites.

The source data will have several formats including data base lists, as well as information embedded in longer written documents that needs to be extracted. The source data will be spread across various different websites, each of which may display the information differently or use different formats.

The data will then need to be amalgamated and presented to the end-user in a visually appealing and easily digestible format (e.g., charts, graphs, etc.). The data will generally be numbers based, e.g. (X% of the Y products feature Z). Accuracy will be paramount as users will be relying on this data.

item.title: Business Analyst - Supply Chain and Finance  (Remote) - Upwork
item.description:
Company Overview: Join Saint Laurent Consulting, a leading firm in business and technology consulting dedicated to driving our clients' success through innovative solutions. We cultivate a culture of continuous learning and development, empowering our team to push boundaries and embrace new opportunities.

Job Summary
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Business Analyst to work closely with the Supply Chain Finance team and Power BI developer team. The ideal candidate will have a strong personality, excellent communication skills, and the ability to manage stakeholders' expectations, deliverables, and communications effectively. Experience with SAP is a significant advantage. This is a remote position that requires a proactive individual who can collaborate closely with our Supply Chain Finance team and PBI developers.

Key Responsibilities
Collaborate with Teams: Work closely with the Supply Chain Finance team and PBI developers to understand business requirements and translate them into actionable insights.
Stakeholder Management: Engage with stakeholders to manage expectations, ensure clear communication, and deliver high-quality outcomes.
Data Analysis and Reporting: Analyze business processes and data, generating reports and visualizations using Power BI and other tools to support decision-making.
Project Management: Manage deliverables and timelines, ensuring projects are completed on schedule and within scope.
Requirement Gathering: Conduct thorough requirements gathering sessions to understand the needs of the business and document them comprehensively.
Process Improvement: Identify areas for process improvement and work with relevant teams to implement changes that enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
SAP Utilization: Utilize SAP knowledge to support various business functions and ensure data integrity and accuracy.
Documentation: Maintain detailed documentation of processes, requirements, and deliverables to ensure transparency and knowledge sharing.

Qualifications
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Information Technology, or a related field.
Experience: Minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in a supply chain finance environment.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in Power BI, SAP, and other relevant software. Advanced Excel skills are required.
Communication Skills: Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey complex information clearly and concisely.
Interpersonal Skills: Strong personality with the ability to manage stakeholders and work effectively in a team environment.
Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.
Project Management: Experience in managing projects, deliverables, and timelines effectively.
Remote Work: Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work setting.

Key Competencies
Strong Leadership: Ability to lead initiatives and drive projects to successful completion.
Proactive Attitude: Self-starter with a proactive approach to problem-solving and process improvement.
Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs and work in a dynamic environment.
Team Collaboration: Excellent team player with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse teams.

What We Offer
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team.
Professional growth and development opportunities.
Flexible remote working environment.

Equal Opportunity Employer
Saint Laurent Consulting is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

item.title: ChatGPT researcher - Upwork
item.description:
20 hours per week - $400 per month

As a ChatGPT Researcher for SaaS AI Products, your primary focus is on performing deep research using ChatGPT, creating visualizations, and leveraging large language models (LLMs) for reporting and analytics. Your goal is to support the development of cloud solutions and enhance data-driven decision-making processes.

Key Responsibilities:
Deep Research Using ChatGPT:

Extensive Research: Utilize ChatGPT to perform comprehensive research on various topics relevant to SaaS AI products. This includes understanding market trends, technological advancements, competitive analysis, and customer needs.

Data Synthesis: Gather, synthesize, and analyze data from multiple sources to provide actionable insights that can drive business strategies and product development.

Literature Reviews: Conduct thorough literature reviews and summarize key findings from academic papers, industry reports, and other authoritative sources to inform product strategy and development.
Visualization Creation:

Data Visualization: Develop visualizations based on research findings to present data in an easily understandable format.

Storytelling with Data: Create compelling and informative visual representations of complex data sets that tell a story and highlight key insights.

Prototype Development: Develop prototypes of visualizations to be integrated into reports and presentations, ensuring clarity and impact.

LLMs for Reporting and Analytics:

Report Generation: Leverage large language models to generate detailed reports that summarize research findings and provide strategic recommendations. Ensure reports are accurate, comprehensive, and tailored to the needs of different stakeholders.

Analytics Integration: Integrate LLMs into existing analytics workflows to enhance reporting accuracy and efficiency. Use LLMs to automate data extraction, cleaning, and preliminary analysis tasks.

Custom Solutions: Develop custom solutions using LLMs to address specific business needs, such as predictive analytics, sentiment analysis, and trend forecasting.

Support for Cloud Solutions:

Cloud Research: Assist in the research and development of cloud-based solutions for AI products. Evaluate different cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for their suitability in hosting AI solutions.

Infrastructure Recommendations: Provide insights and recommendations to improve cloud infrastructure and performance, ensuring scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness.

Integration Assistance: Support the integration of AI models and data pipelines into cloud environments, collaborating with engineering teams to ensure seamless deployment.
Collaboration and Communication:

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, data science, marketing, and sales, to ensure research aligns with business objectives. Facilitate regular meetings and workshops to discuss research findings and their implications.

Stakeholder Engagement: Communicate research findings and visualizations to stakeholders effectively, using presentations, reports, and interactive dashboards. Tailor communication style to suit technical and non-technical audiences.

Feedback Loop: Establish a feedback loop with stakeholders to refine research methodologies and ensure the continuous relevance of research activities.

Continuous Improvement:

Stay Updated: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, LLMs, and cloud technologies. Participate in relevant conferences, webinars, and training programs.

Methodology Enhancement: Continuously seek opportunities to improve research methodologies and visualization techniques. Experiment with new tools and approaches to enhance the quality and impact of research outputs.

Best Practices: Develop and document best practices for using ChatGPT and LLMs in research, ensuring consistency and replicability in research processes.

Qualifications:
Experience:

3+ years of experience in research, data analysis, or a related field, preferably with a focus on AI or SaaS products. Experience in using AI tools and models for research purposes is highly desirable.
Education:

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field such as Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. Advanced degrees (Master's or Ph.D.) are a plus and demonstrate a strong foundation in research methodologies and analytical thinking.
Technical Skills:

Proficiency in using ChatGPT and other LLMs for research and analysis. Familiarity with AI model training, fine-tuning, and deployment is advantageous.
Analytical Skills:

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Strong attention to detail and the ability to think critically and strategically.
Communication Skills:

Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to convey research findings clearly to diverse audiences. Experience in creating reports, presentations, and visualizations that effectively communicate complex concepts.

Tools Proficiency:

Experience with research and visualization tools, as well as cloud platforms and services. Proficiency in using JIRA, Confluence, and other project management tools to coordinate research activities and track progress.

Data Visualization (Plus):

Strong skills in data visualization tools and techniques are a plus. Experience with tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js, as well as proficiency in Python or R for custom visualizations, will be considered an added advantage.

This role focuses on harnessing the power of ChatGPT and LLMs to perform deep research, create insightful visualizations, and support the development of advanced cloud solutions for SaaS AI products.

Budget: $400

item.title: Migration of Marketing KPI Dashboards from Grow to Looker - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced Data Visualization Specialist Needed for Migration from Grow to Looker

Description:
We are seeking a skilled partner to assist our marketing agency in migrating our marketing KPI dashboards from Grow to Looker. This role involves working closely with our Director of Digital, who is based in the Eastern US (UTC -5) and will serve as your primary point of contact for project access and inquiries. The Director has significant experience collaborating with offshore resources and will provide clear user acceptance criteria for each graph, ensuring a smooth workflow by addressing any potential blockers promptly.

Project Overview:
Grow is an all-in-one data warehousing and visualization platform that we have decided to move away from. As we determine our long-term solution, we need an interim migration to Looker due to its seamless integration with Big Query, where our data is currently stored, and its cost-effectiveness.

Scope of Work:
Migrate a Single Dashboard: The initial task involves migrating one Grow dashboard containing approximately 16 graphs to Looker.
Graph Recreation: Each graph in Grow will be recreated in Looker, with the expectation that many static snapshots will be transformed into dynamic, time-series graphs. This means each original Grow graph will be represented by 1-2 Looker graphs.
KPI Cards: Along with the graphs, you will create a series of KPI cards for each graph (1-5 KPI cards per graph) in Looker.
Data Sources: Pre-built data sources in Looker, sourced from Big Query, including Active Campaign, GA4, Adwords, and SQL tables from customer CRMs integrated via Improvado.
Unstyled State Delivery: The dashboard should be delivered in an unstyled state within the first 7 days for evaluation.

Key Requirements:
Proficiency in Looker: Extensive experience with Looker and its integration with Big Query.
Data Visualization Expertise: Ability to recreate complex graphs and KPI cards accurately.
Attention to Detail: Ensuring data accuracy and consistency during the migration process.
Time Management: Capability to deliver the unstyled dashboard within the stipulated 7-day timeframe.
Opportunity for Additional Work:

Upon satisfactory completion of the initial dashboard, there is potential for 5+ additional dashboard migration projects, with a deadline of August 20th.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal detailing your experience with Looker and similar migration projects. Include examples of past work, particularly those involving Grow or similar platforms, and a brief plan on how you intend to approach this migration.

We look forward to collaborating with a dedicated professional who can ensure a seamless transition and maintain the integrity of our data visualizations.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 16:01 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Looker Studio, Tableau, SQL
Skills: Dashboard, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Looker Studio, Tableau, SQL

item.title: Hubspot Automation Specialist for Education Company  - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced HubSpot Automation and Analytics Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of HubSpot’s marketing, sales, and service hubs, with a strong focus on automation, analytics, and reporting. This role will be crucial in optimizing our marketing and sales processes, improving customer engagement, and driving data-driven decision-making.

Responsibilities:

• HubSpot Automation:
• Design, implement, and manage marketing automation workflows, email campaigns, and lead nurturing processes within HubSpot.
• Develop and optimize lead scoring models to improve lead quality and conversion rates.
• Create and maintain custom properties, forms, and landing pages.
• Ensure all automation processes are aligned with best practices and business objectives.
• Analytics and Reporting:
• Set up and maintain dashboards, reports, and analytics tools to track key performance metrics across marketing, sales, and customer service.
• Analyze campaign performance data to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for optimization.
• Provide regular reports and insights to the team and stakeholders, highlighting the effectiveness of various strategies and suggesting improvements.
• Data Management:
• Ensure data integrity and cleanliness within the HubSpot CRM.
• Implement processes for data enrichment, segmentation, and deduplication.
• Collaborate with other teams to ensure seamless data flow and integration with other tools and platforms.
• Collaboration and Support:
• Work closely with the marketing, sales, and customer service teams to understand their needs and provide HubSpot-related support and training.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest HubSpot features, updates, and industry trends.
• Proactively suggest and implement improvements to current processes and workflows.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a HubSpot specialist, with a strong understanding of HubSpot’s marketing, sales, and service hubs.
• Experience in designing and managing marketing automation workflows, email campaigns, and lead nurturing processes.
• Strong analytical skills and experience in setting up and managing dashboards and reports.
• Proficient in data management and ensuring data integrity within a CRM.
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
• HubSpot certification(s) is a plus.
• Knowledge of HTML/CSS and basic understanding of web development is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with additional marketing automation platforms.
• Familiarity with SEO, SEM, and content marketing strategies.
• Knowledge of SQL and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).

How to Apply:

item.title: FINOP PREO: Comprehensive Microsoft Assets and User Audit Solution - Upwork
item.description:
Description
The Finop project aims to develop an integrated solution leveraging Microsoft technologies to provide system administrators with a global view of their Microsoft assets, users, and related details. The solution will mainly use Azure Managed Applications, Microsoft   GraphAPI for data extraction, and Power BI for data visualization and analysis. Key functionalities include real-time data synchronization, a well-structured database model, and a Power BI app featuring dashboards for User Data Visualization, Security, and Assets Audit. This project will streamline the monitoring and audit of user activities, security policies, and software licenses, enhancing overall organizational efficiency and cost saving.

Developers
Skills for Backend Developer:
1. Azure Managed Applications: Experience in designing, deploying, and managing
Azure Managed Applications.
2. Microsoft Graph API: Proficiency in using Microsoft Graph API for data extraction
and integration.
3. Azure Services: Knowledge of various Azure services such as Azure Functions,
Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Storage.
4. Database Design: Skills in designing and managing databases, preferably with
Azure SQL Database or similar.
5. API Development: Expertise in developing and managing RESTful APIs.
6. Data Synchronization: Experience with implementing data synchronization
mechanisms.
7. Security and Permissions: Understanding of Azure security practices and
permission management.
8. Scripting and Automation: Proficiency in scripting languages like PowerShell or
Python for automation tasks.

Phase 1: Planning and Design
Initial meeting and requirements gathering
2. Solution architecture design
3. Data model design

Phase 2: Development of the Azure Managed Application
4. Initial configuration of Azure Managed Application

item.content:encoded:
Description
The Finop project aims to develop an integrated solution leveraging Microsoft technologies to provide system administrators with a global view of their Microsoft assets, users, and related details. The solution will mainly use Azure Managed Applications, Microsoft   GraphAPI for data extraction, and Power BI for data visualization and analysis. Key functionalities include real-time data synchronization, a well-structured database model, and a Power BI app featuring dashboards for User Data Visualization, Security, and Assets Audit. This project will streamline the monitoring and audit of user activities, security policies, and software licenses, enhancing overall organizational efficiency and cost saving.

Developers
Skills for Backend Developer:
1. Azure Managed Applications: Experience in designing, deploying, and managing
Azure Managed Applications.
2. Microsoft Graph API: Proficiency in using Microsoft Graph API for data extraction
and integration.
3. Azure Services: Knowledge of various Azure services such as Azure Functions,
Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Storage.
4. Database Design: Skills in designing and managing databases, preferably with
Azure SQL Database or similar.
5. API Development: Expertise in developing and managing RESTful APIs.
6. Data Synchronization: Experience with implementing data synchronization
mechanisms.
7. Security and Permissions: Understanding of Azure security practices and
permission management.
8. Scripting and Automation: Proficiency in scripting languages like PowerShell or
Python for automation tasks.

Phase 1: Planning and Design
Initial meeting and requirements gathering
2. Solution architecture design
3. Data model design

Phase 2: Development of the Azure Managed Application
4. Initial configuration of Azure Managed Application
5. Implementation of microservices for data extraction via Microsoft Graph API: This is just a proposal, having a microservice for each permission could make it
scalable and easy to control the data refresh frequency.

item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Power BI expert to create visually appealing and informative dashboards using data from our existing systems, which have been consolidated into a data warehouse. The visuals will be used to analyze and present key insights to stakeholders. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Power BI's capabilities and be able to transform complex data into easy-to-understand visuals. * Advanced knowledge of Power BI, including DAX and Power Query
* Experience with data modeling and creating interactive dashboards
* Proficiency in SQL and data warehousing concepts
* Strong analytical skills to interpret complex datasets
* Ability to collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide insights
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

item.title: Senior power automate developer with RPA exp - Upwork
item.description:
We administer programs for a wide range of publicly traded clients, nonprofit organizations, and privately held companies.  Many of our programs are funded with life insurance products.  On a routine basis - often monthly - we need to log into an insurance company's website, download updated policy information, save it to our Dropbox folders, open our custom Excel models, import the downloaded values, produce reports, and send the reports to client via email.  This process is currently manual.

We are on a mission to automate as many of these procedures as possible in 2024.  We have been exposed to Power Automate and have rudimentary experience with its capabilities.  We are looking to hire a consultant who can work with us to implement a range of Power Automate procedures.  We need an individual consultant to gain an understanding of our current technology and setup, advise us on how to set up Power Automate capabilities across our 15 member firm, and then help us to develop and roll-out flows.

We prefer to work with only individual developers.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$45.00
Posted On: July 19, 2024 13:25 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Automation, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft PowerApps, Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel
Skills: Automation, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft PowerApps, Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel
